name: adsphere-backend
description: Backend microservices for AdSphere advertising management platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:auth-service" "npm run dev:ad-integration" "npm run dev:data-processing" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:api-gateway && npm run build:auth-service && npm run build:ad-integration && npm run build:data-processing && npm run build:notification
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:shared && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../ad-integration-service && npm install && cd ../data-processing-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:services
scripts.test:services: cd api-gateway && npm test && cd ../auth-service && npm test && cd ../ad-integration-service && npm test && cd ../data-processing-service && npm test && cd ../notification-service && npm test

author: AdSphere Backend Team
